name: MYC_MESG_SEX_QTNS
description: This table contains patient answers to sexual activity questions submitted in a history questionnaire.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SEX_QUESN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the sexual activity history question answered by the patient.

columns.name: SEX_QUESN_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.

columns.name: SEX_QUESN_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the sexual history question.

columns.name: SEX_QUESN_CMT
columns.description: The comment entered by the patient for the sexual history question.

columns.name: SEX_QUESN_FILED_YN
columns.description: The filed status of the sexual activity question--has the provider filed it to the patient's record.
